content: Courses: Application Engineering & Development (INFO 5100), Web Design & User Experience Engineering (INFO 6150), Network Structures & Cloud Computing (CSYE 6225), Database Management & Database Design (DAMG 6210), User Experience Design/Testing (CSYE 7280), Web Tools & Methods (INFO 6250)
Courses: Java, C++, Web Design OOPs Concepts, Data Structures and Algorithms, Cloud Computing, Neural Networks, Machine Learning

description: Worked on 2 projects, DCU AI and DCU BOLO in which I developed production ready features in VueJS and NodeJS and also worked with AWS services such as S3 and DynamoDB.
Spearheaded Terraform introduction with 5+ team members and led the training process.

experiences.company: Colgate Global Business Services | Mumbai, IN
description: Automated a global gross price report from SAP R3 to PostgreSQL using Python Django, reducing pricing tickets by 50%â€‹
Identified problem area with resource prioritization of 200+ weekly tickets with rising user dissatisfaction with Atlas app
Developed integration testing code for Atlas UI with Cypress IO, saving 100 minutes of manual testing hours for resources
